body.name: Vactidy Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 6 in 1 Lightweight Stick Vacuum Self-Standing, Powerful Rechargeable Vacuum Cleaner Up to 35 Mins Runtime, Cordless Vacuum with LED Screen for Hardwood Floor Pet Hair
features: 🌀【2 Powerful Suction Modes】Vactidy V8 Pro cordless stick vacuum with upgraded 160W motor has 2 speed levels. The ECO mode can effectively pickup dust, debris and fine particles from floors and furniture surfaces; the MAX mode up to 25,000 Pa provides deep cleaning of low-pile carpets and easy removal of pet hair and dander.

🌀【Self-Standing, Free Your Hands】Vactidy V8 Pro vacuum cleaners has a self-standing design, you can easily stop and step away from the cleaning process, also easily place the stick vacuum anywhere, free your hands at any time. The retractable metal tube help to extend the suitable height. The main body is about 3.3lb which is very lightweight for olders even kids.

🌀【Max 35 Mins Running Time】With 6 Cell 2200 mAh rechargeable battery, Vactidy V8 Pro cordless vacuum provides lasting runtime. It can last up to 35 minutes on ECO mode and 15 minutes on MAX mode, allowing you to clean your entire home without interruption. You can charge it in the vacuum or charge the handle (battery included) separately. Full fast charge in 4 hours.

🌀【LED Touch Screen】The LED display can clearly show the working status of the cordless stick vacuum cleaner, such as battery power and suction mode. You can choose the suction mode on the display to suitable for different cleaning tasks. Switching on and off is also done through the display. With accessory storage rack, no need to worry about lost accessories.

🌀【6 in 1 Multi-function Vacuum】Comes with 2-in-1 brush and long crevice tool, Vactidy V8 Pro stick vacuum cordless rechargeable can be quickly converted into a portable handheld vacuum to meet various household cleaning demands. Like stairs and windowsills, sofa and bed, ceilings and curtain, table and desk, bookshelves and narrow gaps, even in cars, RV, etc.

🌀【Multi-Cyclone + Hypa Filtration System】Vactidy V8 Pro vacuum cordless adopts a 4-layer filtration system to filter dust as small as 0.1 microns. 7 high-speed spiral winds are formed in the cones to settle fine dust particles, prevent dust from clogging the filter, and H10 grade hypa filter out 99.97% of tiny particles, providing fresh air for you and your family.

🌀【Upgraded EasyGrab & Flexible Maneuverability】The hardwood floor vacuum is equipped with LED lights illuminating all the fine dust and pet hair. Swivels 180° sideways and 90° up and down flexible and movable, it glides under furniture and cabinets easily. Upgraded floor brush with bristles and plastic strip to get better at grabbing dust from hardwood and carpet.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vactidy Blitz V8 Pro Cordless Vacuum Cleaner - Well Clean, Well Use, Well Done.

Cordless Vacuum for Carpet and Hardwood Exceptional 25Kpa suction power ensure efficient removal of dust, dirt, and debris from hardwood floors and low pile carpet, leaving your home spotless. 35mins Long Runtime Powered by a 2200mAh 6-cell rechargeable battery, the V8 Pro vaccum provides up to 35 minutes of runtime, ensure you can can continuously clean the entire house. Multifunctional Vacuum Equipped with electric brush head, 2-in-1 dust brush and long crevice nozzle, the vaccine cleaner can be adapted to different cleaning tasks, such as hard floors, rugs, curtains, furniture, etc. Low Noise Level The household vacuum cleaners operate at a less 66 db noise level, ensuring a quiet cleaning experience. Retractable Metal Tube With the telescopic tube (from 18" to 27" ), you can freely adjust the length to clean hard-to-reach areas. It also makes the cordless vacuum easier to store and carry.

Ready When You Are When you want to sit and rest while you clean up your house, the self-standing cordless vacuum cleaner can be set aside without falling over. LED Touch Display Get the information of small vacuum cleaner performance in real time, includes the remaining battery, power mode. And you can adjust the power mode by touch screen. Flexible Floor Brush Head With a flexible 180° swivel sideways and 90° up and down, the vaccuum glides under furniture and cabinets easily to eliminate dust and debris that is hard to reach. Storage Wall Mount Wall-mounted design makes it convenient to store the wireless vacuum & accessories and saves space in your home. The vacuum cleaner handle is detachable to charge.

Previous page Delving Into Dark Corners LED headlights on lightweight vacuum spot dust/debris in dark corners, ensuring thorough cleaning. Avoid Secondary Pollution 500ml capacity dust cup and one-click release to bring you a effortless dust removal experience. Offer Less Maintenance The hepa filter and whole dustbin as well as internal components are detachable and washable. Next page 1 A Healthier Home 2 LED Headlights 3 Single-Touch Emptying 4 Easy to Clean
Previous page Next page 1 6-in-1 Combination 2 What You Get 3 V8 Pro VS V8 4 How to Install Wall Mount

Can the charger adapter support 220V volts? The adapter is a 2 prong charger, it can be used for 100V -240V volts. Can it be used on long pile carpet? It is not recommended for long pile carpets, but it works for short pile carpets. Can the battery be charged separately? Yes, but the battery is included in handle, not battery separately. How long does the battery last? The 6*2200mAh lithium-ion battery provides 15 minutes in Max mode, 35 minutes in Eco mode.(*Test results for reference. Run time varies based on cleaning mode、accessories and cleaning tasks.) What should I do when the suction becomes weak? Please check if there is any blockage in dust container、roller brush 、tube and hepa filters at the first time. Regular clean and replacement of accessories can extend of the life of the vacuum. If still no solved, please send us message freely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Compared with the old corded vacuum cleaner at home, this cordless vacuum cleaner is much easier to use. It is easy to operate, has strong suction power, and is lightweight. Almost the entire house in my house has hard floors. I can use this vacuum cleaner to clean the floors very easily and smoothly. The electric brush head is very flexible. It can clean everything around the furniture and in the corners of the room. No matter it is crumbs, potato chips, hair or dust. Effortlessly cleans. In addition, the vacuum cleaner lasts for a long time, and it is easy to disassemble and clean the garbage in the dust cup after each use. With this vacuum cleaner, daily cleaning at home is no longer difficult, saving both time and effort. A good cordless vacuum cleaner worth buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Because the vacuum cleaner at home is broken, so I bought this one temporarily, I think it is not very good to use, it is very light, it is not very heavy in the hand, and the suction is very strong, the living room is not dirty immediately, so I must like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm so enjoy the cordless vacuum now, you can go any where without wired stuff.self-standing is a big plus , save my space , big plus in New York city.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very cost-effective, strong suction, long battery life. Convenient and flexible. Worth buying

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Overall build quality is good and very light weight, suction power is very very good, use it everywhere, hardwood floor or carpets. Our house is mainly hardwood so this is perfect for cleaning up after our grandsons and dog.Charging is easy & fast, you can pull out the battery to charge which is very nice, we had one where the charge port is on the machine itself.The filter is on top instead one of the older style cylindrical ones, much easier to take out and clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: Efficienza e Leggerezza Confluiscono nel Vactidy V8 Pro
reviews.reviewText: Ho recentemente acquistato il Vactidy Aspirapolvere Senza Fili V8 Pro, e devo dire che sono rimasto piacevolmente sorpreso dalle sue prestazioni. Questa scopa elettrica senza fili si distingue per la sua potenza e versatilità, rendendola un'aggiunta preziosa per la pulizia domestica.Potenza e PrestazioniCon una potenza di aspirazione di 25kpa, il V8 Pro non ha avuto problemi a raccogliere polvere, peli di animali e detriti più pesanti sia su pavimenti duri che su tappeti. L'aspirapolvere ha dimostrato di avere una capacità di pulizia eccellente, lasciando le superfici notevolmente pulite.Design e ManeggevolezzaUna delle caratteristiche più impressionanti è il suo design ultra-leggero. La maneggevolezza è eccezionale, permettendo di raggiungere angoli e spazi ristretti senza sforzo. Il passaggio da scopa elettrica a aspirapolvere portatile è semplice e intuitivo, il che lo rende perfetto per pulire mobili e interni auto.AutonomiaL'autonomia di 35 minuti si è rivelata adeguata per le sessioni di pulizia quotidiane in un appartamento di dimensioni medie. La batteria ha mantenuto una carica costante durante l'uso, senza perdita di potenza.Senza SaccoIl fatto che sia senza sacco aggiunge comodità, con un sistema di svuotamento del contenitore che ho trovato igienico e facile da usare.RumoreIn termini di rumore, il Vactidy V8 Pro è ragionevolmente silenzioso rispetto ad altri aspirapolvere senza fili che ho provato in passato.ConclusioniNel complesso, il Vactidy Aspirapolvere Senza Fili V8 Pro è un'ottima scelta per chi cerca un dispositivo potente, leggero e versatile per la pulizia quotidiana. Offre un ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo, soprattutto considerando le sue prestazioni e la facilità d'uso. Lo raccomando vivamente a chiunque sia alla ricerca di un'esperienza di pulizia senza sforzo e efficiente.

Je recommande !Je ne le quitte plus, léger et robuste à la fois je ne suis pas déçue de la qualité.Et le système de lumière permets de voir les surfaces sales très facilement c'est génial !Très bonne autonomie et très bonne puissance, un plaisir à passer dans les escaliers et super efficace sur les tapis !Et agréablement surprise car très silencieux, du coup top pour passer un petit coup d'aspirateur une fois les enfants coucher.En bref, super rapport qualité prix !

Ich bin begeistert von meinem neuen Staubsauger! Die Saugleistung ist beeindruckend und schafft mühelos mit Leichtigkeit sowohl Teppiche als auch Hartböden. Die vielseitigen Aufsätze machen die Reinigung von schwer erreichbaren Stellen zum Kinderspiel.Die kabellose Funktion ermöglicht uneingeschränkte Bewegungsfreiheit, und die lange Akkulaufzeit reicht problemlos für eine gründliche Reinigung der gesamten Wohnung aus. Der Staubbehälter ist einfach zu entleeren, was den Wartungsaufwand minimiert.Die hochwertige Verarbeitung und das moderne Design machen den Staubsauger zu einem Blickfang im Haushalt. Die Geräuschentwicklung ist angenehm niedrig, was besonders in bewohnten Bereichen von Vorteil ist.Insgesamt bin ich äußerst zufrieden mit meinem Kauf und kann diesen Staubsauger jedem empfehlen, der nach Effizienz, Komfort und modernem Design sucht!

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto con buen cepillo y luz
reviews.reviewText: Si bien cuento con un fabuloso robot aspirador del cual estoy más que satisfecho, debo reconocer que este tipo de dispositivos tiene sus limitaciones. En este contexto, los aspiradores con escoba se presentan como una excelente opción para acompañar y complementar la limpieza.Lo primero que salta a la vista es su característica inalámbrica, lo cual supone una gran ventaja al garantizar que el aspirador siempre esté listo para su uso. Además, el sistema de colgado en la pared resulta especialmente práctico, manteniendo el dispositivo accesible en el momento que lo necesito.Es esencial tener en cuenta que, aunque estos aspiradores anuncian una potencia de succión de 25 kilopascales, esta se apoya principalmente en el uso de rodillos mecánicas en la parte del cepillo. Esto implica que la succión es más efectiva cuando el aspirador está en contacto directo con el suelo, siendo excelente para aspirar el suelo, pero posiblemente menos potente al enfrentarse a polvo en superficies elevadas. Olvidate de quitarle el cepillo y aspirar el polvo o migas..para ese tipo de tareas no tiene potencia.Para hacer ese tipo de limpiezaexiste posibilidad de extraer el mango telescópico, lo que amplía su versatilidad al permitir la limpieza de suciedad en lugares que no están en el suelo, sin necesidad de realizar malabares. Pero no es muy higienico pasar el mismo rodillo que pasas por el suelo por la mesa...Como es común en los modelos actuales, el aspirador cuenta con luz a la altura del suevlo, una característica práctica que revela la presencia de polvo que no se percibe a simple vista. Esto resulta especialmente útil para detectar zonas con mayor acumulación de suciedad...y sentirnte un poco sucio...jaja.Al ponerse en marcha, el aspirador dispone de dos modos: ECO y MAX. Es importante destacar que la autonomía mencionada se refiere al modo ECO, ya que el modo MAX proporciona una potencia adicional, aunque limitada a 15-20 minutos. Este aspecto puede ser relevante dependiendo de las necesidades individuales de limpieza.El sistema de almacenamiento sigue el típico diseño ciclónico con una capacidad de 500 ml, según indica el fabricante. Mantenerlo limpio es esencial para conservar la potencia de succión del aspirador.La característica inalámbrica emerge como un elemento crucial que marca la diferencia en términos de usabilidad, brindando comodidad y libertad durante el proceso de limpieza.En cuanto al precio, adquirí este producto por menos de 100€ gracias a un cupón, lo que lo convierte en una opción más que competente. En mi caso, lo considero un complemento ideal para el robot aspirador, ofreciendo un buen rendimiento, accesorios completos y capacidades satisfactorias. En resumen, creo que este aspirador inalámbrico proporciona un valor satisfactorio para las tareas de limpieza diaria y cotidiana, sin defraudar en su desempeño general.Todas mis opiniones se guían por la siguiente estructura de estrellas:1 ★: Producto muy insatisfactorio. No recomiendo su compra.2 ★★: Tiene deficiencias significativas, no cumple con el 100% de sus funciones esperadas.3 ★★★: Es un producto promedio. Cumple con lo esperado.4 ★★★★: Muy bueno y satisfactorio. Me ha gustado y es un producto de calidad.5 ★★★★★: Excelente, supera expectativas. Algo lo hace excepcionalmente bueno.

Sono rimasto sinceramente impressionato dall'efficienza di questo aspirapolvere.Ho una casa divisa su più piani e per non fare sempre le scale ho deciso di prendere un aspirapolvere per il piano superiore.La prima cosa che ho notato è stata la sua potenza sorprendente. Rispetto all'altro aspirapolvere (xiaomi) questo vactidy riesce senza problemi ad aspirare le crocchette del gatto.Facile sollevarlo per raggiungere zone più alte senza affaticare le braccia grazie al fatto che è molto leggero.Ho trovato furbo e piacevole avere due filtri HEPA inclusi. In questo modo una volta lavato il filtro posso subito usare l'aspirapolvere senza dover aspettare la completa asciugatora. Apprezzato!.Senza dubbio consiglio questo aspirapolvere conveniente e pratico per le pulizie domestiche.Aggiungo anche che l'aspirapolvere resta in piedi da solo!. Comodo.
